title: Evli Bank’s demerger and the remaining company’s merger with Fellow Finance have been registered; Evli Plc’s listing application has been approved and trading in shares will commence on April 4, 2022 - Yahoo Finance
content: Evli Bank’s demerger and the remaining company’s merger with Fellow Finance have been registered; Evli Plc’s listing application has been approved and trading in shares will commence on April 4, 2022  Yahoo Finance
description: EVLI PLC STOCK EXCHANGE RELEASE 2 APRIL 2022 AT 4.00 PM. EET NOT FOR PUBLICATION OR DISTRIBUTION, IN WHOLE OR IN PART, DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, IN OR INTO AUSTRALIA, SOUTH AFRICA, HONG KONG, JAPAN, CANADA OR SINGAPORE, NEW ZEALAND, THE UNITED STATES OR ANY OTHER JURISDICTION WHERE SUCH PUBLICATION OR DISTRIBUTION WOULD VIOLATE APPLICABLE LAWS OR RULES OR WOULD REQUIRE ADDITIONAL DOCUMENTS TO BE COMPLETED OR REGISTERED OR REQUIRE ANY MEASURE TO BE UNDERTAKEN IN ADDITION TO THE REQUIREMENTS UNDER F
